item.title: Deep Learning Book: Chapter 9 — Convolutional Networks
item.description: When discussing deep learning, two models have become the leading buzzwords — Convolutional Neural Networks, which are the topic of this post, and Recurrent Neural Networks, which will be discussed soon. The blog post The venture: Inveterate Learner
